alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 6:16PM MDT until September 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 616 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the city of Hildale. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Hildale/Colorado City dispatch reported widespread ponding of water on roadways in the towns. The Short Creek river gage jumped from 0.1 feet to 3.7 feet in 30 min. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
